person.persName: Orlando Coburn Richardson Jr. (Meade County, Kentucky, lawyer)

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis R. Richardson and Priscilla Richardson. Married to Sarah E. Richardson in Meade County, Kentucky, on June 14, 1864. Attended school in Meade County in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Meade County in 1850. Graduated from the University of Louisville in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Lawyer in Meade County in 1860.
